channel.title: Alexandra Moxin on ₿itcoin Transcripts
channel.description: Recent content in Alexandra Moxin on ₿itcoin Transcripts

item.title: Future Of Privacy Coins
item.description: Future of privacy coins AM: That’s not good. Hi everyone. Thanks for coming to the future of privacy coins panel. I want to spend a minute talking ablout backgrounds and interest in this area. BG: I have a PhD in something. I got into monero a couple of years ago. I needed to pay rent, so I did some work in math in exchange for money. AP: I work on confidential transactions and scriptless scripts and I do not have a PhD.
